meaningMnemonic: <radical>Slide</radical> some <radical>dirt</radical> on your <radical>legs</radical> so you can feel like you're from a <kanji>previous</kanji> time. Everything from the past is in the dirt. Dead people, dinosaur bones, your mom's secrets in a box from her past life. All these things come back to you as you slide the dirt all over your legs.
readingMnemonic: As you sit there, pretending you're in a <kanji>previous</kanji> time you see a <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん)! That's right! Centaurs are from wayyyy in the <kanji>past</kanji>.
